Position Title:               Executive AssistantEmployment Type: Full-Time  Salary:                          all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications Job Location:               Abu Dhabi, UAE About the Client: A prominent group based in Abu Dhabi, with international collaboration and successful track records in the area of F&B, providing customers with the best visit experience.Job Description: Support the CEO in all daily and monthly activities to include coordinating his schedule, flights, communications. minutes meetings. Reports, filing, documentation, Presentations, etc.
Support the CEO in managing and coordinating various projects by tracking progress, following up on action items with different departments within the group.Skills
Skills:
Female, 28 to 40 years old
At least 5 years of solid experience in the same role from industries like industry (group / large retail / well-known brands)

Must be locally available in Abu Dhabi
Candidates who can join immediately is preferred
